text.section:
Each objection in a proceeding shall be filed with the Commissioner:
After the filing of the application for a warrant; and
Within the later to occur of:
Six months after the issuance of the warrant; or
60 days after the surveyor returns the certificate of survey under this title.

Each objection shall be signed and verified by the objector and contain a certification that a copy of the objection was forwarded, at the address on record with the Commissioner, to:
The applicant;
Each other party in the proceeding; and
Each other person entitled to notice under § 13-404(b) of this subtitle.

If any information required by this section is unavailable when the objection is filed, it may be included in an amendment to the objection, if the amendment is filed in advance of any hearing before the Commissioner or any proceeding for declaratory relief.
